name: Potion Maker (Pommesflasche)
description:
Potion Maker

Created in 3 hours for Trijam #172: Off the Shelf.

Create the requested off the shelf potions for all kinds of ailments. You have 30 seconds to create as many potions as you can. Potions are sold for 2 coins. A wrong component costs you 1 coin.

A potion must always be created from top to bottom: first the flask, then the ingredient and then finalize it with the cap.

🔨 Tools
  • Godot 3.4.4
  • https://sfxr.me/
📄 Credits
  • Background music: "Random Battle" by controllerhead, released under CC0
